sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-pagination
    ref="pagination"
    :current-page.sync="page"
    :layout="layout"
    :page-size="pageSize_"
    :page-sizes="[5, 10, 50, 100]"
    :total="total"
    @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
    @size-change="handleSizeChange"
  >
  </el-pagination>
</template>

<script>

import request from '../../utils/request'

export default {
  name: 'Pagination',
  props: {
    /* 合并单元格相关（开始） */
    autoBuild: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: true
    },
    needMerging: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    tableData: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
      default: function () {
        return undefined
      }
    },
    mergedAttrName: {
      type: String | Array,
      required: false,
      default: undefined
    },
    orderIndexArrName: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: undefined
    },
    showMergedIndex: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    orderBy: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: function () {
        return {attrNames: [], orders: []}
      }
    },
    /* 合并单元格相关（结束） */
    url: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    params: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
      default: function () {
        return {}
      }
    },
    pageSize: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
      default: 10
    },
    // 紧凑型
    small: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
      default: false
    },
    // 刷新回调事件，参数为rows
    refreshDone: {
      type: Function,
      required: false,
      default: null
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    if (true === this.autoBuild) {
      this.reload()
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleSizeChange(val) {
      this.pageSize_ = val
      this.buildData()
    },
    handleCurrentChange(val) {
      this.page = val
      this.buildData()
    },
    buildData() {
      if (this.url) {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
          this.tableData_ = []
          this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
          let data = {
            'page': this.page,
            'params': this.params,
            'limit': this.pageSize_
          }
          request({
            url: this.url,
            method: 'post',
            data
          }).then(result => {
            this.page = result.data.current
            this.pageSize_ = result.data.size
            this.total = result.data.total
            this.tableData_ = result.data.records
            if (true === this.needMerging) {
              this.getOrderNumber()
              this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
              this.$emit('updateOrderIndexArr', this.orderIndexArr_, this.orderIndexArrName)
            } else {
              this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
            }
            this.$refs.pagination.internalCurrentPage = this.page
            this.refreshDone && this.refreshDone(result.data)
            resolve()
          }).catch(error => {
            reject(error)
          })
        })
      }
    },
    reload() {
      return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        this.tableData_ = []
        this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
        let data = {
          "page": 1,
          "params": this.params,
          "limit": this.pageSize_
        }
        request({
          url: this.url,
          method: 'post',
          data
        }).then(result => {
          this.page = result.data.current
          this.pageSize_ = result.data.size
          this.total = result.data.total
          this.tableData_ = result.data.records
          if (true === this.needMerging) {
            this.getOrderNumber()
            this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
            this.$emit('updateOrderIndexArr', this.orderIndexArr_, this.orderIndexArrName)
          } else {
            this.$emit('input', this.tableData_)
          }
          this.refreshDone && this.refreshDone(result.data)
          resolve()
        }).catch(error => {
          reject(error)
        })
      })
    },
    query(data) {
      request({
        url: this.url,
        method: 'post',
        data
      }).then(result => {
        this.page = result.data.current
        this.pageSize_ = result.data.size
        this.total = result.data.total
        // 回调
        this.$emit('input', result.data.records)
        this.refreshDone && this.refreshDone(result.data)
      })
    },
    // 获取相同编号的数组（核心方法）
    getOrderNumber() {
      // 如果有排序的要求，且赋值合理，则按照用户的要求进行排序
      let correctOrderBy = this.getCorrectOrderBy()
      let attrNames = correctOrderBy.attrNames
      let orders = correctOrderBy.orders
      // 按照 attrNames 排序，将 attrNames 相同的数据连在一起
      this.tableData_ = this._.orderBy(this.tableData_, attrNames, orders)
      // 为构建 orderIndexArr 做前置准备
      let orderObj = this.prepareForOrderIndexArr()
      // 需要合并的行的 index 已经存在了同一个数组里，把这些数组存储到 this.orderIndexArr
      this.orderIndexArr_ = []
      for (const k in orderObj) {
        this.orderIndexArr_.push(orderObj[k])
      }
      if (true === this.showMergedIndex) {
        this.handleMergedRowIndex(this.tableData_, this.orderIndexArr_)
      }
    },
    prepareForOrderIndexArr() {
      let orderObj = {}
      if (typeof this.mergedAttrName === 'string' || this.mergedAttrName instanceof String) {
        this.tableData_.forEach((element, index) => {
          element.rowIndex = index
          if (orderObj[element[this.mergedAttrName]]) {
            orderObj[element[this.mergedAttrName]].push(index)
          } else {
            orderObj[element[this.mergedAttrName]] = []
            orderObj[element[this.mergedAttrName]].push(index)
          }
        })
      } else if (this.mergedAttrName instanceof Array) {
        this.tableData_.forEach((element, index) => {
          element.rowIndex = index
          let mergedValueArray = []
          for (const mergedAttrName of this.mergedAttrName) {
            mergedValueArray.push(element[mergedAttrName])
          }
          let mergedValue = mergedValueArray.join(',')
          if (orderObj[mergedValue]) {
            orderObj[mergedValue].push(index)
          } else {
            orderObj[mergedValue] = []
            orderObj[mergedValue].push(index)
          }
        })
      }
      return orderObj
    },
    // 行序号改为合并后的行序号（合并单元格）
    handleMergedRowIndex(tableData, orderIndexArr) {
      a:for (const row of tableData) {
        const rowIndex = row.rowIndex
        for (let i = 0; i < orderIndexArr.length; i++) {
          const val = orderIndexArr[i]
          for (const number of val) {
            if (rowIndex === number) {
              row.mergedRowIndex = i
              continue a
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    // 无论用户给的排序规则是否合理，此方法将会处理得到正确的排序规则
    // 说明：
    // ① 排序规则必须服从于合并字段，因此，如果需要排序，排序字段中必须包含合并字段，且位于最前。
    // ② 不需要排序或指定的排序规则不合理时，默认按照合并字段进行排序。
    getCorrectOrderBy() {
      let _orderBy = {attrNames: [], orders: []}
      if (this.orderBy.attrNames.length * this.orderBy.orders.length <= 0 || this.orderBy.attrNames.length !== this.orderBy.orders.length) {
        _orderBy = this.getDefaultOrderBy()
      } else {
        if (typeof this.mergedAttrName === 'string' || this.mergedAttrName instanceof String) {
          if (this.orderBy.attrNames[0] === this.mergedAttrName) {
            _orderBy.attrNames = this.orderBy.attrNames
            _orderBy.orders = this.orderBy.orders
          } else {
            _orderBy = this.getDefaultOrderBy()
          }
        } else if (this.mergedAttrName instanceof Array) {
          let flag = true
          if (this.orderBy.attrNames.length < this.mergedAttrName.length) {
            flag = false
          } else {
            let attrNamesToCheck = this.orderBy.attrNames.slice(0, this.mergedAttrName.length)
            for (const attrNameBeingChecked of attrNamesToCheck) {
              if (!this._.includes(this.mergedAttrName, attrNameBeingChecked)) {
                flag = false
                break
              }
            }
          }
          if (true === flag) {
            _orderBy.attrNames = this.orderBy.attrNames
            _orderBy.orders = this.orderBy.orders
          } else {
            _orderBy = this.getDefaultOrderBy()
          }
        } else {
          _orderBy = this.getDefaultOrderBy()
        }
      }
      return _orderBy
    },
    // 当用户给的排序规则和合并字段冲突时，处理得到默认的排序规则
    getDefaultOrderBy() {
      let _orderBy = {attrNames: [], orders: []}
      if (typeof this.mergedAttrName === 'string' || this.mergedAttrName instanceof String) {
        _orderBy.attrNames = [this.mergedAttrName]
        _orderBy.orders = ['asc']
      } else if (this.mergedAttrName instanceof Array) {
        _orderBy.attrNames = this.mergedAttrName
        for (let i = 0; i < this.mergedAttrName.length; i++) {
          _orderBy.orders.push('asc')
        }
      }
      return _orderBy
    },
    clearData(){
      this.page =1;
      this.pageSize_ = this.pageSize;
      this.total =0;
      this.orderIndexArr_ = [];
      this.tableData_ =[];
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      page: 1,
      pageSize_: this.pageSize,
      total: 0,
      orderIndexArr_: [],
      tableData_: this.tableData
    }
  },
  watch: {
    sort(val) {
      this.reload()
    },
    keyword(val) {
      this.reload()
    }
  },
  computed: {
    layout() {
      return this.small ? 'total, prev, pager, next' : 'total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper'
    }
  }
}
</script>


<style>

</style>
